app_description: The Translate Anything app is your best choice for translating any type of text speech photos or objects in more than 50 worldwide languages. We offer multiple input methods for your words or objects that need translations such as: TYPING or SPEAKING: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly PHOTOS: Take or import photos containing words or objects for the most accurate translations LIVE TRANSLATIONS: Translate text or objects instantly by just pointing the camera where needed OBJECT DETECTION: Use your photos and camera to take advantage of our cutting edge objects detection system and receive words within objects translated for you immediately You don t need to worry anymore about any kind of conversation in any language anywhere across the globe. We translate languages immediately and accurately! We created the app in order for it to be very easy to use and to solve all your needs. You will only need to focus on the main subjects of your conversations from now on and not worry about any stressful translations. Permissions Requested: Microphone for speach translations Camera and Photo Gallery for translating text and objects from your pictures Download the Translate Anything app now and enjoy the powerful features that make conversing with friends family and coworkers across the globe easy and fun! Take the stress out of translating anything and enjoy your conversations! The Translate Anything App Premium Subscription Join the Translate Anything App Premium Features Club to get: Unlimited translations in more than 100 languages No ads The Translate Anything app has different subscription plans. Subscription payments are charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period or trial. Subscriptions starting with a trial automatically renew for the indicated price after the trial period ends. Any unused portion of a free trial period if offered will be forfeited when you purchase a premium subscription during the trial period. Subscriptions may be managed by you and auto renewal may be turned off by going to your Account Settings after purchase Settings iTunes App Store Apple ID and select Subscriptions Link to Terms of Use: http: translateanythingapp.com pp.html terms of service Link to Privacy Policy: http: translateanythingapp.com pp.html privacy policy
